title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 104.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 104.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Chapter 484 of the Laws of 1985 amended the Vehicle and

Traffic Law to provide for the registration and titling of vessels, the
registration and control of vessel dealers and the certification of yacht
brokers. These regulations are intended to establish rules and procedures, where necessary, to implement the provisions of that law with respect to
vessels. For the purposes of this Part, the term boat shall be used to mean
vessel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
104.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
